text: Carlos Raúl Contreras Guillén (7 October 1938 – 17 April 2020) was a Chilean football defender. He played for Chile in the 1962 FIFA World Cup. He played for the team from 1959 to 1966.1982 FIFA World Cup Chile He also played for Club Universidad de Chile to 1958 to 1969. He was born in Santiago, Chile. Contreras Guillaume died in Puente Alto, Chile on 17 April 2020 of Alzheimer's disease-related problems, aged 81.Muere Carlos ‘Pluto’ Contreras, mundialista de 1962 y baluarte del Ballet Azul ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Chilean footballers
title: Carlos Contreras (footballer, born 1938)
